caption.title: Comparison of the performance of NCE-based policies under different modes of prevention.
caption.p: The solid lines/dashed lines are the results under the mode of single-step contact tracing/iterative contact tracing respectively. The performance of the NCE â©¾ m policy is measured by the relative effect over random prevention (please see text for definition). Three levels of threshold m are calculated: m = 1 (blue), m = 2 (orange), and m = 2 (green).
